item.description:
Hello Everyone -

This will be our last kayaking trip for the 2010 summer season ;-( Although we're planning to kayak in the morning, following kayaking one of our members was gracious enough to open their Kingston home for an end of the summer Pot luck BBQ. (see meetup email for BBQ RSVP) Both Kayaking and BBQ is a short 10 minutes drive from the Route 3 South highway.

This email is to RSVP for kayaking ONLY. There will be a subsequent email to RSVP for the BBQ after kayaking. You don't have to kayak to come to the BBQ!!


Kayaking is a flat $25's and is a fresh water flat paddle for all levels, pretty easy paddle! Please mention in the comments section if you'd like to include a guest and if there's plenty of room, I'll send you an email so you can add them.

Hope to see you all there!

NOTE DIRECTIONS: Please follow the directions from the website as it's off the beaten path where GPS may not provide accurate enough directions

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Our Last Kayaking Event for the Season
